item.title: About Me
item.description: Welcome to my page! My name is Abbey Haymond, and I am a second-year honors students at the University of Nebraska - Lincoln pursuing degrees in Sports Media & Communication and Advertising & Public Relations. I call Dawsonville, Georgia home, but reside in Lincoln, Nebraska, as I complete my undergraduate education. Outside of classes, I work with HuskerVision where I film games, make highlight reels, and create content for all of Husker Athletics.

item.title: A Plain Markdown Post
item.description: This is a post written in plain Markdown (*.md) instead of R Markdown (*.Rmd). The major differences are: You cannot run any R code in a plain Markdown document, whereas in an R Markdown document, you can embed R code chunks (```{r}); A plain Markdown post is rendered through Blackfriday, and an R Markdown document is compiled by rmarkdown and Pandoc. There are many differences in syntax between Blackfriday’s Markdown and Pandoc’s Markdown.
